A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie itself was fine (not much better then average). Although\, it did not feel like a Star Wars movie at all. Where are all the deep plots? Where is the lightsaber battles? Where is the excitement and wonder? The movie did do a good job at making the middle of the trilogy more somber then the beginning movie\, but what plot is even left for the last movie. I for one would am not 100% interested  in the new characters because they spent such little time respecting and learning from their elders that it's almost illogical. Although i would say this movie is worth a watch\, it really doesn't earn more then that and leaves me really disipointed in what could have been done and with what is left for the last of this trilogy.
